title: S16 Ep132: Hillbilly Horror Stories w/Jerry Paulley
itunes:title: Hillbilly Horror Stories w/Jerry Paulley
description:
Darkness Radio presents Hillbilly Horror Stories with Jerry Paulley

Podcaster/Author/Investigator Jerry Paulley sits down with Dave and Tim to tell them why the spooky is more prevalent in the South by unveiling some Hillbilly Horror Stories, and shares some of his more personal experiences, including how he has repaired his relationship with his Mom from the other side, and how he share something strange in common with Tim!Â 

Get the book here: https://amzn.to/3qlhafi
